nodes.text: The BBQ droid  was a cooking droid of the Trade Federation, that was deployed whenever the Trade Federation's Neimoidians became hungry. In 32 BBY, it stood on an asteroid in the Naboo system. It prepared a meal while it watched Bravo Flight member Rhys Dallows engage in training drills against holographic starfighters with Essara Till. It appeared to be wearing a chef's hat.
This droid is an Easter egg in Star Wars: Starfighter. The droid can be seen by entering the code DIRECTOR into the code menu, and then starting the Fighter Training bonus mission.
